0.name: Swing Dance Etiquette
0.fullDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Halftime to Make It Rain
0.fullDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single target enemy and additionally deals DMG for 4 times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a random enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to single enemy targets with 5 Bounces in total.

0.name: All-Out Footlight Parade
0.fullDesc: Grants all allies the Backup Dancer effect, lasting for {{1}} turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Trailblazer's every turn. Allies with the Backup Dancer effect have their Break Effect increased by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. And when they attack enemy targets that are in the <u>Weakness Broken state</u>, the Toughness Reduction of the attack will be converted into 1 instance of <u>Super Break DMG</u>.
0.shortDesc: Grants all allies the Backup Dancer effect. Allies with Backup Dancer have their <orangeStrong>Break Effect increased</orangeStrong> and additionally deals <orangeStrong><u>Super Break DMG</u></orangeStrong> 1 time when they attack enemy targets that are <u>Weakness Broken</u>.

0.name: Now! I'm the Band!
0.fullDesc: After the Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, all allies' Break Effect increases by {{1, percent}}%, lasting for {{2}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: At the start of the next battle, increases all allies' Break Effect.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Dance With the One
0.fullDesc: When the number of enemy targets on the field is 5 (or more)/4/3/2/1, the Super Break DMG triggered by the Backup Dancer effect increases by {{1, percent}}%/{{2, percent}}%/{{3, percent}}%/{{4, percent}}%/{{5, percent}}%.

0.name: Shuffle Along
0.fullDesc: When using Skill, additionally increases the Toughness Reduction of the first instance of DMG by {{1, percent}}%.

0.name: Hat of the Theater
0.fullDesc: Additionally delays the enemy target's action by {{1, percent}}% when allies Break enemy Weaknesses.

1.name: Best Seat in the House
1.desc: After using Skill for the first time, immediately recovers {{1}} Skill Point(s).

2.name: Jailbreaking Rainbowwalk
2.desc: When the battle starts, the Trailblazer's Energy Regeneration Rate increases by {{1, percent}}%, lasting for {{2}} turn(s).

3.name: Sanatorium for Rest Notes
3.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

4.name: Dove in Tophat
4.desc: While the Trailblazer is on the field, increases the Break Effect of all teammates (excluding the Trailblazer), by an amount equal to {{1, percent}}% of the Trailblazer's Break Effect.

5.name: Poem Favors Rhythms of Old
5.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Tomorrow, Rest in Spotlight
6.desc: The number of additional DMG applications by the Skill increases by {{1}}.
